name: Blob.
description:
A game where you have to kepp a blue blob alive by feeding it mixed substances and keping it at it's preferred temperature.

FOR HTML MAKE BROWSER FULLSCREEN (F11)

AND RUN ON FIREFOX (best results)

This game was made for the 2018 June GodotJam

I finished the game in a hurry, so any feedback would be much appreciated.

I'll try to fix any noticed bug and update the game frequently.
